Dashboard for UNB CIC

This is a visualization dashboard with both ends for the UNB CIC.

Javascript for frontend, and Python for the backend.

Libraries include:

  • bootstrap (layout)
  • d3 (visualization)
  • jquery (DOM)
  • datatables (data display)

and

  • Flask (web server)

Package management is bower.

View Demo
